author: pcaversaccio
content:
Posting here for visibility (if there is a better channel, please let me know and I will move the message). I have published this week a privacy roadmap for Ethereum here: https://hackmd.io/@pcaversaccio/ethereum-privacy-the-road-to-self-sovereignty. Please use the ethresearch thread for feedback here: https://ethresear.ch/t/ethereum-privacy-the-road-to-self-sovereignty/22115

Vitalik published after his own version here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/a-maximally-simple-l1-privacy-roadmap/23459, which can be worked on in parallel.

I invite all core devs for feedback, particularly around how we can make privacy a priority in the hard fork roadmap going forward.
